overview:
Vice President, Content & Operations Content Strategy, Project and Product Management, Public Safety Client Lead

Chris Hebert specializes in online product development, content strategy, marketing and project management. Chris joins Go Forward Media after nearly a decade at Cygnus Business Media, most recently serving as the Publisher of the company’s Public Safety Interactive group. He came to Cygnus in 1998 with Dave as Co-Founder of Firehouse.com, the Web’s leading firefighting portal.

He has led content and product development on projects of all scales, ranging from breaking news to dynamic educational Webcast programs. He brings a deep passion for the Web to client projects to bridge great content ideas with the the latest Web technologies – driving compelling, profitable Web products.
